com.viaoa.html

Class OATextArea

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.viaoa.html.OAHtmlComponent
      • com.viaoa.html.OATextField
        • com.viaoa.html.OATextArea
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable

    public class OATextArea
extends OATextField
    ObjectBound TextArea 
        [Java Code]
    OATextArea txta = new OATextArea(hubJob,"benefits");
    form.add("txtDesc",txta);
    ....
    [HTML Code]
    <textarea name="txtDesc" rows="3" cols="12" wrap="VIRTUAL|PHYSICAL|OFF"><%=form.getTextArea("txtDesc").getText()%></textarea>
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
